original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police detained 102 people who fled from the Kandakadu Treatment & Rehabilitation Center, Polonnaruwa.
Major General (Retired) Darshana Hettiarachchi, the Commissioner General of Rehabilitation, speaking to News 1st, said that operations are underway to locate another 37 escapees.
Long-term addicts are housed at the Kandakadu Treatment & Rehabilitation Center as per court orders, and are subject to rehabilitation.
This was not the first time that a mass breakout was reported from the Kandakadu Treatment & Rehabilitation Center.
